original_text: Jesus said to them ‘The man who will give me to the rulers is eating from the same dish as I am.
korean_text: 대답하여 이르시되 나와 함께 그릇에 손을 넣는 그가 나를 팔리라

sentences.original_text: The man who will give me to the rulers
is eating from the same dish as I am
sentences.korean_translation: 나와 같은 그릇에서 음식을 먹고 있다
